issues.message: Shifting signed 32-bit value by 31 bits is undefined behaviour
Refactor this function to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 40 to the 15 allowed.
Shifting signed 32-bit value by 31 bits is undefined behaviour
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "(%s)%s" 3 times.
